data.name: Tactical Intervention - Terrorist Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Save 60% off regular prices!

It’s your turn to play the bad guys, but do you and your brethren have the tools and the talent to teach those CTs the power of your principles? It’s time to arm yourselves to the teeth and bring about the chaos that the people of the world secretly clamour for! Take these weapons, equip this gear, and work side-by-side with your faithful Bulldog – exclusive to this pack! Fight, win, prevail!

Each pack contains the following permanent items:
  • A unique Bulldog pet, only available in this DLC!
  • AK-47 Assault Rifle
  • UZI Para SMG
  • Flak Helmet
  • Sphinx Pistol
  • XTrainer Shoes
  • Midnight I Holster
  • The Bomber Character Model

The perfect way to ensure that your objectives are completed with brutal force!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7600 / ATI Radeon™ X800
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.6.6
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel Core Duo Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2400 / NVidia 8600M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
